DOC.brief_summary: Plasma adiponectin concentration is inversely associated with renal function. There is little literature on adiponectin levels and regulation by antihypertensive medication with an angiotensin II-receptor blocker (ARB), especially in subjects with type 2 diabetes in different stage of chronic kidney disease (CKD).
DOC.brief_title: Adiponectin and Insulin Resistance in Diabetic Nephropathy
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetic nephropathy CKD at stage 1~4 Type 1 diabetes or nondiabetic renal disease An elevated plasma K level.
